A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is a shame I can't give 0 stars. Because this film is not even worth this amount. The SJW propaganda throughout the entire movie in itself was enough for this score. You got smacked in the face with it\, to such extend that it gets anoying and distracts from the (poor) storyline. The story itself\, especially if you are familiar with the previous movies\, made no sense whatsoever. Disney absolutely ruined the Star Wars franchise\, I will not go to the last one. And funny enough there is no need to see the last one\, because the story is so badly written. There is no set-up for the last movie..
